nodes.text: The Star Forge Robe first appeared in BioWare's RPG video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, released in July 2003. Star Forge Robes can be created at one of the computer rooms on the Star Forge for a large number of computer spikes. The robe gave the wearer an increase in their wisdom and saves. In the non-canonical dark side storyline of the game, these robes cannot be created. Instead, a different set of robes would be created, mimicking but not matching Revan's original Sith robes.
